service.name: quickShipEntireOrder
service.description: Quick Ships An Entire Order Creating One Shipment Per Facility and Ship Group. All approved order items are automatically issued in full and put into one package. The shipment is created in the INPUT status and then updated to PACKED and SHIPPED.

service.name: quickShipOrderByItem
service.description: Quick Ships An Order By Item

service.name: quickShipPurchaseOrder
service.description: The mirror of quickShipEntireOrder, this service automatically creates shipments for an entire purchase order. All order items on each ship group is created as a Shipment. All items on a Shipment are automatically issued to a Package. The shipment's status is first set to CREATED and then set as SHIPPED. The facilityId is used to set the destinationFacilityId of the Shipment.

service.name: createShipmentForReturn
service.description: Create a Return Shipment with information from ReturnHeader fields

service.name: createShipmentAndItemsForReturn
service.description: Create a Return Shipment and ShipmentItems with information from ReturnHeader and ReturnItems

service.name: createShipmentAndItemsForVendorReturn
service.description: Create a Return Shipment and ShipmentItems with primaryReturnId

service.name: setShipmentSettingsFromPrimaryOrder
service.description: Set Shipment Settings From Primary Order

service.name: balanceItemIssuancesForShipment
service.description: Release the purchase order's items assigned to the shipment but not actually received; it is invoked as a seca when the purchase shipment is marked as 'received'

service.name: checkCancelItemIssuanceAndOrderShipmentFromShipment
service.description: Check Shipment Items and cancel Item Issuance and Order Shipment

service.name: quickDropShipOrder
service.description: Creates a drop shipment for a ship group and calls updateShipment twice in succession to set shipment status to PURCH_SHIP_SHIPPED and then to PURCH_SHIP_RECEIVED

service.name: splitShipmentItemByQuantity
service.description: Splits the specified ShipmentItem creating a new ShipmentItem with the given newItemQuantity. NOTE that this does manage OrderShipment records, but NOTHING else, so it is only to be used for Shipment Plan stuff BEFORE the items are issued, shipment packed, etc.

service.name: duplicateShipmentRouteSegment
service.description: Duplicates a shipment route segment and creates the new route segment in the NOT_STARTED status

service.name: quickScheduleShipmentRouteSegment
service.description: Schedules a shipment route segment with the carrier and service level in the ShipmentRouteSegment entity. Actual scheduling is done by an async service, and this does not return an error, so it can be called in a multi-form, and one failed shipment scheduling does not cause other shipments to be rolled back.

service.name: issueOrderItemToShipment
service.description: Issue an OrderItem to a Shipment - only for non-sales orders

service.name: issueOrderItemShipGrpInvResToShipment
service.description: Add an OrderItemShipGrpInvRes to a Shipment - only for sales orders

service.name: issueInventoryItemToFixedAssetMaint
service.description: Issue an InventoryItem to a FixedAssetMaint - for conversion to use as supples/parts

service.name: returnInventoryItemIssuedToFixedAssetMaint
service.description: Return InventoryItem Issued to a FixedAssetMaint - for conversion to use as supples/parts

service.name: cancelOrderItemIssuanceFromSalesShipment
service.description: Cancel an ItemIssuance from Sales Shipment

service.name: issueInventoryItemToShipment
service.description: Issue an InventoryItem to a Shipment

service.name: completeVerifiedPick
service.description: Complete the picking and set the shipment to PICKED

service.name: setPackageInfo
service.description: Set the weight, dimensions/shipmentBoxType of package in SESSION

service.name: updatePackedLine
service.description: Update the weight, dimensions/shipmentBoxType of package

service.name: deletePackedLine
service.description: Delete the weight, dimensions/shipmentBoxType of package

service.name: completePackage
service.description: Complete the packging and set the shipment to packed

service.name: completeShipment
service.description: Complete the packaging set the shipment to packed

service.name: savePackagesInfo
service.description: Save the package(s) information in ShipmentPackage entity from session

service.name: calcPackSessionAdditionalShippingCharge
service.description: Totals package weights and calls the calcShipmentCostEstimate via the PackingSession

service.name: clearLastPackage
service.description: Clears the last package in the packing session

service.name: clearPackLine
service.description: Clear a single line from the current packing session

service.name: completePack
service.description: Complete the packaging set the shipment to PACKED

service.name: addOrderShipmentToShipment
service.description: Add an OrderShipment and a ShipmentItem - only for sales orders

service.name: removeOrderShipmentFromShipment
service.description: Delete an OrderShipment and updates the ShipmentItem

service.name: getQuantityForShipment
service.description: get the order item quantity still not put in shipments

service.name: updatePurchaseShipmentFromReceipt
service.description: Whenever a ShipmentReceipt is generated, check the Shipment associated with it to see if all items were received. If so, change its status to PURCH_SHIP_RECEIVED. The check is accomplished by counting the products shipped (from ShipmentAndItem) and matching them with the products received (from ShipmentReceipt).

service.name: issueOrderItemToShipmentAndReceiveAgainstPO
service.description: Issues order item quantity specified to the shipment, then receives inventory for that item and quantity

service.name: calcShipmentEstimateInterface
service.description: Interface for shipment estimate calc service

service.name: calcShipmentCostEstimate
service.description: Generic Shipment Cost Estimate Calc Service - Use ShipmentCostEstimate Entities

service.name: cancelReceivedItems
service.description: Cancel Received Items against a purchase order if received something incorrectly

service.name: getShipmentPackageValueFromOrders
service.description: Calculates the total value of a shipment package by totalling the results of the getOrderItemInvoicedAmountAndQuantity service for the orderItem related to each ShipmentPackageContent, prorated by the quantity of the orderItem issued to the ShipmentPackageContent. Value is converted according to the incoming currencyUomId.

service.name: setShipmentStatusPackedAndShipped
service.description: Move a shipment into Packed status and then to Shipped status

service.name: sendShipmentCompleteNotification
service.description: Send a notification on Shipment Complete

service.name: updateIssuanceShipmentAndPoOnReceiveInventory
service.description: Update issuance, shipment and order items if quantity received is higher than quantity on purchase order

service.name: createCarrierShipmentBoxType
service.description: Create a new Carrier Shipment Box Type Record

service.name: updateCarrierShipmentBoxType
service.description: Update a Carrier Shipment Box Type

service.name: deleteCarrierShipmentBoxType
service.description: Delete an existing Carrier Shipment Box Type Record
